def candle():
	t=int(raw_input())
	for i in range(t):
		x=raw_input().split()
		for j in range(10):
			x[j]=int(x[j])
		p=x.index(min(x))
		if p==0:
			if x[0]>=min(x[1:]):
				x[0]=max(x)+1
				p=x.index(min(x))
			else:
				sys.stdout.write('1')
		print(str(p)*(1+min(x)))


if __name__=="__main__":
	import sys
	candle()
